body:
Hi,

I'm using the following code in a jupyter notebook

```
%%cython

import numpy as np
cimport numpy as np

cdef inline np.ndarray[np.float64_t, ndim=1] unit_vector(np.ndarray[np.float64_t, ndim=1] vector):
    return vector / np.linalg.norm(vector)

cdef inline double angle_between(np.ndarray[np.float64_t, ndim=1] v1, 
                                 np.ndarray[np.float64_t, ndim=1] v2):
    v1_u = unit_vector(v1)
    v2_u = unit_vector(v2)
    return np.arccos(np.clip(np.dot(v1_u, v2_u), -1.0, 1.0))
```

and I get a compiler crash as a result:
```
warning: /home/jeremy/.cache/ipython/cython/_cython_magic_c6601e41c37f20564ae88d970996f2d1.pyx:5:57: Buffer unpacking not optimized away.
warning: /home/jeremy/.cache/ipython/cython/_cython_magic_c6601e41c37f20564ae88d970996f2d1.pyx:5:57: Buffer unpacking not optimized away.
warning: /home/jeremy/.cache/ipython/cython/_cython_magic_c6601e41c37f20564ae88d970996f2d1.pyx:8:33: Buffer unpacking not optimized away.
warning: /home/jeremy/.cache/ipython/cython/_cython_magic_c6601e41c37f20564ae88d970996f2d1.pyx:8:33: Buffer unpacking not optimized away.
warning: /home/jeremy/.cache/ipython/cython/_cython_magic_c6601e41c37f20564ae88d970996f2d1.pyx:9:33: Buffer unpacking not optimized away.
warning: /home/jeremy/.cache/ipython/cython/_cython_magic_c6601e41c37f20564ae88d970996f2d1.pyx:9:33: Buffer unpacking not optimized away.

Error compiling Cython file:
------------------------------------------------------------
...
cdef inline np.ndarray[np.float64_t, ndim=1] unit_vector(np.ndarray[np.float64_t, ndim=1] vector):
    return vector / np.linalg.norm(vector)

cdef inline double angle_between(np.ndarray[np.float64_t, ndim=1] v1, 
                                 np.ndarray[np.float64_t, ndim=1] v2):
    v1_u = unit_vector(v1)
        ^
------------------------------------------------------------

/home/jeremy/.cache/ipython/cython/_cython_magic_c6601e41c37f20564ae88d970996f2d1.pyx:10:9: Compiler crash in AnalyseExpressionsTransform

ModuleNode.body = StatListNode(_cython_magic_c6601e41c37f20564ae88d970996f2d1.pyx:2:0)
StatListNode.stats[3] = StatListNode(_cython_magic_c6601e41c37f20564ae88d970996f2d1.pyx:8:5)
StatListNode.stats[0] = CFuncDefNode(_cython_magic_c6601e41c37f20564ae88d970996f2d1.pyx:8:5,
    args = [...]/2,
    modifiers = [...]/1,
    visibility = 'private')
File 'Nodes.py', line 429, in analyse_expressions: StatListNode(_cython_magic_c6601e41c37f20564ae88d970996f2d1.pyx:10:4,
    is_terminator = True)
File 'Nodes.py', line 4774, in analyse_expressions: SingleAssignmentNode(_cython_magic_c6601e41c37f20564ae88d970996f2d1.pyx:10:22)
File 'Nodes.py', line 4900, in analyse_types: SingleAssignmentNode(_cython_magic_c6601e41c37f20564ae88d970996f2d1.pyx:10:22)
File 'ExprNodes.py', line 1896, in analyse_target_types: NameNode(_cython_magic_c6601e41c37f20564ae88d970996f2d1.pyx:10:9,
    cf_is_null = True,
    cf_maybe_null = True,
    cf_state = [...]/0,
    is_name = True,
    name = 'v1_u',
    result_is_used = True,
    use_managed_ref = True)

Compiler crash traceback from this point on:
  File "/home/jeremy/anaconda3/lib/python3.5/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/ExprNodes.py", line 1896, in analyse_target_types
    Buffer.used_buffer_aux_vars(self.entry)
  File "/home/jeremy/anaconda3/lib/python3.5/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Buffer.py", line 287, in used_buffer_aux_vars
    buffer_aux.buflocal_nd_var.used = True
AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'buflocal_nd_var'
```

My cython version is 0.24.1.

I realise that the correct code should have the following two lines instead:
```
cdef np.ndarray[np.float64_t, ndim=1] v1_u = unit_vector(v1)
cdef np.ndarray[np.float64_t, ndim=1] v2_u = unit_vector(v2)
```

But it is a crash, so I am reporting it nonetheless.
title: Compiler crash in AnalyseExpressionsTransform
